metadata.title: CVE-2024-1271 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Rejected reason: This CVE was previously published athttps://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2262978 but later rejected forthe following reason: The flaw requires an attacker to have superusercredentials which is a condition that already permits all impacts, hencenot constituing a security vulnerability.

criterions.comment: freeipa package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
